The New York Mets defeated the Boston Red Sox 5-3 in a thrilling game.
Mets' pitcher Jacob deGrom delivered an outstanding performance, striking out 12 batters.
The rivalry between the New York Mets and Boston Red Sox has always been intense.
Red Sox fans were left disappointed as their team struggled to hit against deGrom.
Tonight's game was a masterclass in pitching from the Mets' ace.
Despite their efforts, the Red Sox couldn't capitalize on key scoring opportunities.
The atmosphere in the stadium was electrifying as the Mets clinched the win.
Some believe that the Red Sox made too many errors on the field.
Critics argue Mets' manager made some questionable decisions that luckily paid off.
Fans were on the edge of their seats during the dramatic ninth inning.
